original_text: King Jeroboam was standing in front of the altar at Bethel. He was ready to make an offering. At that time, the Lord told one of his servants to go from Judah to Bethel. Kings 12 Kings 14
korean_text: 보라 그 때에 하나님의 사람이 여호와의 말씀으로 말미암아 유다에서부터 벧엘에 이르니 마침 여로보암이 제단 곁에 서서 분향하는지라

sentences.original_text: King Jeroboam was standing in front of the altar
sentences.korean_translation: 여로보암 왕이 제단 앞에 서 있었다

sentences.original_text: He was ready to make an offering
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 제사를 드릴 준비를 하고 있었다

sentences.original_text: the Lord told one of his servants
sentences.korean_translation: 주님께서 그의 종 중 한 사람에게 말씀하셨다

sentences.original_text: to go from Judah to Bethel
